## kl vpn new

Create new context

### Synopsis

```
This command let create new context.
Example:
  # create new context
  kl context new

	# creating new context with name
	kl context new --name <context_name>
	
```

### Options

```
  -d, --device string   device name
  -h, --help            help for new
  -h, --help   help for new
```
